alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:44AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Doniphan, southeastern Holt and west central Andrew Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rulo, or 8 miles southeast of Falls City, Nebraska moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highland, Troy, Oregon, Forest City, White Cloud, Big Lake, Fortescue, Iowa Point, Fanning and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 65 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
